column5: Designed by engineers, for engineers, the online Engineering Management MSc/PGCert from the University of Leeds will equip you with practical and theoretical knowledge of modern engineering, alongside a grounding in management. It aims to meet the needs of a changing engineering environment and will expand your career options in engineering management upon graduation.Youâ€™ll learn to evaluate the risks and opportunities associated with innovative technologies, management techniques and market approaches, and use this knowledge to influence company strategy and impress employers.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
